channel.title: Blogs on ODIN
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on ODIN

item.title: First Consortium Meeting at Karlsruhe
item.description: Everything was going well until Cham sneezed. The sound was so loud that everyone just evacuated immediately.

item.title: Signing Memorandum of Understanding
item.description: “XENON, DARWIN and LZ representatives signed a Memorandum of Understanding in July 2021 in which they commit to work together at the next detector, but leave the location open.
